original_text: As for coral and jasper, they are not nearly as valuable as wisdom. 28: Coral is found in the sea and people use it as a beautiful jewel. Its price is more than the price of rubies. As for coral and jasper,
korean_text: 진주와 벽옥으로도 비길 수 없나니 지혜의 값은 산호보다 귀하구나

sentences.original_text: they are not nearly as valuable as wisdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 지혜만큼 결코 가치 있지 않다

sentences.original_text: Coral is found in the sea
and people use it as a beautiful jewel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들은 그것을 아름다운 보석으로 사용한다

sentences.original_text: Its price is more than the price of rubies
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 가격은 루비의 가격보다 더 비싸다
